thread.title: Hugh Grant, Anna Eberstein expecting second child
thread.title_full: Hugh Grant, Anna Eberstein expecting second child - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Hugh Grant, Anna Eberstein expecting second child
text:
Actor Hugh grant is expecting second baby with Swedish television producer girlfriend Anna Eberstein.
READ: When Elizabeth Hurley caught Grant eyeing woman
The baby will be 55-year-old British actor's fourth child, reported People magazine.
The Bridget Jones's Diary star is father to four-year-old Tabitha Jing Xi and son Felix, two, with Tinglan Hong and son, John Mungo, three, with Eberstein.
Previously, Grant dated actress Elizabeth Hurley for 13 years, before splitting in 2000.
